Text: Ah, those times.... Double feature Rocky Horror - Phantom of the Paradise, people in costume, people screaming insults at Brad or Janet, the sweet-acrid smell of pot in the back rows, cider available during the intermission, what an experience... at no less than the unforgettable 99 cent Roxy...
Yeah man, hash tho was king. Pipe like Pippin's, trip like Gandalf's, munchies like forever.

English subtitles to sing along here:
